sourcesContent: import { Component ,Output,EventEmitter,} from '@angular/core'; import { Todos } from 'src/app/todos'; import { DatePipe } from '@angular/common' @Component({ selector: 'app-add-todo', templateUrl: './add-todo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-todo.component.css'] }) export class AddTodoComponent { title: string |undefined; description: string |undefined; @Output() todoAdd: EventEmitter = new EventEmitter(); onSubmit(){ const currentDate = new Date; const todo={ sno:8, title:this.title, description : this.description, active: true, date:new Date().toLocaleString(), } if(this.title && this.description != null){ this.todoAdd.emit(todo); } } }
